tasks.label: Build NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/main.asm; ca65 src/reset.asm; ld65 src/reset.o src/main.o -C nes.cfg -o main.nes

tasks.label: Build Background NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/Fondo/background.asm; ca65 src/Fondo/reset.asm; ld65 src/Fondo/reset.o src/Fondo/background.o -C nes.cfg -o src/Fondo/background.nes

tasks.label: Build Characters NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/Personajes/characters.asm; ca65 src/Personajes/reset.asm; ld65 src/Personajes/reset.o src/Personajes/characters.o -C nes.cfg -o src/Personajes/characters.nes

tasks.label: Build Movement NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/Movimiento/input.asm; ca65 src/Movimiento/controllers.asm; ca65 src/Movimiento/reset.asm; ld65 src/Movimiento/input.o src/Movimiento/controllers.o src/Movimiento/reset.o -C nes.cfg -o src/Movimiento/movement.nes

tasks.label: Build Animation NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/Animacion/animation.asm; ca65 src/Animacion/reset.asm; ld65 src/Animacion/animation.o src/Animacion/reset.o -C nes.cfg -o src/Animacion/animation.nes
